ingredients: 1 (15 oz) can black beans, drained and rinsed
1/2 cup queso fresco or cotija cheese, crumbled
Chipotle crema: 1/4 cup sour cream or Greek yogurt mixed with 1 tsp adobo sauce
steps: Divide cilantro-lime rice among serving bowls
Top with tinga (protein with sauce), black beans, and corn
Add sliced avocado, crumbled queso fresco, pickled jalapeños, and fresh cilantro
Drizzle with chipotle crema and serve with lime wedges
title: Tinga Bowl
